 h1-cli

```
h1-cli

Synopsis

  $ h1-cli <group> <command> 

Options

  --help    Show help message and exit. 

Command List

  config       Management of CLI configuration    
  iam          Management of iam namespace        
  provider     Management of provider namespace   
  container    Management of container namespace  
  database     Management of database namespace   
  insight      Management of insight namespace    
  website      Management of website namespace    
  dns          Management of dns namespace        
  storage      Management of storage namespace    
  networking   Management of networking namespace 
  compute      Management of compute namespace    
  billing      Management of billing namespace    
  vmhost       Management of vmhost namespace     
  auth         Authenticate to use CLI
```

 h1-cli config

```
h1-cli config

Synopsis

  $ h1-cli config <group> <command> 

Options

  --help    Show help message and exit. 

Command List

  settings    Manage settings of CLI   
  extension   Manage extensions of CLI
```

 h1-cli config settings

```
h1-cli config settings

  $ h1-cli config settings <group> <command>

  --help    Show help message and exit.
```

 h1-cli config extension

```
h1-cli config extension

Synopsis

  $ h1-cli config extension <group> <command> 

Options

  --help    Show help message and exit. 

Command List

  list        List available and installed extensions 
  install     Install (or update) extension           
  uninstall   Uninstall extension
```

 h1-cli config extension list

```
h1-cli config extension list

  List available and installed extensions 

Synopsis

  $ h1-cli config extension list <options> 

Global options

  --help                                      Show help message and exit.                        
  --verbose                                   Make the operation more talkative.                 
  -o, --output tsv,list,json,js,id,uri,yaml   Specify output format of command                   
  --query string                              JMESPath query string                              
  --passport-file path                        Passport file. Defaults to ~/.h1/passport.json.    
  --as uri                                    Act as another actor eg. service account           
  --no-wait                                   In case of queued event do not wait for completion 

Operation options
```

 h1-cli config extension install

```
h1-cli config extension install

  Install (or update) extension 

Synopsis

  $ h1-cli config extension install <options> 

Global options

  --help                                      Show help message and exit.                        
  --verbose                                   Make the operation more talkative.                 
  -o, --output tsv,list,json,js,id,uri,yaml   Specify output format of command                   
  --query string                              JMESPath query string                              
  --passport-file path                        Passport file. Defaults to ~/.h1/passport.json.    
  --as uri                                    Act as another actor eg. service account           
  --no-wait                                   In case of queued event do not wait for completion 

Operation options

  --extension string   Extension name to install    
  --version string     Extension version to install
```

 h1-cli config extension uninstall

```
h1-cli config extension uninstall

  Uninstall extension 

Synopsis

  $ h1-cli config extension uninstall <options> 

Global options

  --help                                      Show help message and exit.                        
  --verbose                                   Make the operation more talkative.                 
  -o, --output tsv,list,json,js,id,uri,yaml   Specify output format of command                   
  --query string                              JMESPath query string                              
  --passport-file path                        Passport file. Defaults to ~/.h1/passport.json.    
  --as uri                                    Act as another actor eg. service account           
  --no-wait                                   In case of queued event do not wait for completion 

Operation options

  --extension string   Extension name to install
```

```
  $ h1-cli iam organisation policy create <options> 

Global options

  --help    Show help message and exit.

  --organisation id-or-uri     Organisation Id
```
